artist: Engraver: Theodor Vercruys; Delineator: Francesco Petrucci; Painter: After Titian (Tiziano Vecelli)
description: 3/4 length of man in black facing right and looking at viewer; sword in PR hand; spear(?) in PL hand; wearing hat with feathers; coat has 8 buttons, braided sash
